sentences.english: I think we are still living in a male-dominated society.
sentences.chinese: 我认为现今社会依然以男性为主导。

sentences.english: For now it would be heavier than the sand of the sea: therefore my words are swallowed up.
sentences.chinese: 现今都比海沙更重，所以我的言语急躁。

sentences.english: Internet dating, speed dating and dating agencies are all very popular nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 网恋，闪电恋，婚介所在现今都很流行。

sentences.english: There aren't too many examples of this style. of architecture left nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 现今这种风格的建筑已所剩无几了。

sentences.english: It is science that is right now thought to be mysticism.
sentences.chinese: 它是现今被认为是神秘学的科学。

sentences.english: Nowadays an apartment in the center of the city costs an arm and a leg!
sentences.chinese: 现今，位于市中心的一套公寓房要的是天价。

sentences.english: Yet LDP rule in its present form is in terminal decline.
sentences.chinese: 然而，自民党现今的统治方式已病入膏荒。

sentences.english: Leading the effort today are Western-oriented leaders who are almost uniformly young.
sentences.chinese: 现今领导群伦的都是清一色奉西方为圭臬的年轻人。

sentences.english: The "New Human" refers to the young about 20 years old.
sentences.chinese: “新新人类”是指现今20岁左右的青年。

sentences.english: Today the business environment is more petitive and fast-changing than ever.
sentences.chinese: 现今的商业环境，竞争愈发剧烈，变革弹指之间。

sentences.english: One man said it was getting towards the long days and the short nights now.
sentences.chinese: 只听见有一个人在说，现今是快到日长夜短的时刻了。

sentences.english: But in mos tcompanies these days, a signed statement from the past employee is needed.
sentences.chinese: 现今在大多数的公司里，都会和雇员签署声明。

sentences.english: It should be expanded to include the strain now causing sickness in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 对于现今在欧洲引发疾病的病菌变种也须实施监控。

sentences.english: Leisure life, even cow does not need to Work Like Cow now.
sentences.chinese: 休闲自在，现今的牛也不用做牛做马了。

sentences.english: Today's situation is singularly dire, but it won't last.
sentences.chinese: 现今的形势格外的严峻，但是这种情况不会持久。

sentences.english: Some people claim that competition is more important than co-operation in the present-day society.
sentences.chinese: 一些人认为现今社会竞争要比合作重要。

definition: (idiom) up to the present/even now/now (in contrast with the past)/at this late hour
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
Xinxing county in Yunfu 雲浮|云浮[Yun2 fu2], Guangdong/Xinxing or Hsinhsing district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan
(of markets, industries, infectious diseases etc) rising/emerging/in the ascendant
to be in vogue/to be prevalent
to rise/to spring up/to burgeon/to be aroused/to come into vogue
the last few years/last several years/recent years
